document.full_text: law enforcement officials announced thursday the arrest of 21 people who they said used an area of the tohono o'odham indian reservation to smuggle marijuana and migrants from mexico.
document.title: southwest: arizona: 21 arrested in smuggling ring
lines_and_colors: law enforcement officials announced thursday the arrest of 21 people who they said used an area of the tohono o'odham indian reservation to smuggle marijuana and migrants from mexico.
